Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hill-Cec12 (UCLL1c, XXA, cecropin, natural AMPs;insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (75.51%) toHill-Cec11GRAVY: -0.20; Mol W: 5278.239; Mol formula: C237H402N73O62; Mol Ex coeff: 5550.Activity: Active against S-aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC >32-64 uM), E. coli ATCC 8739 (MIC 0.25-2.0 uM), P. aeruginos (MIC 1-2 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Van Moll L, De Smet J, Paas A, Tegtmeier D, Vilcinskas A, Cos P, Van Campenhout L.2022
Literature Information.Title: In Vitro Evaluation of Antimicrobial Peptides from the Black Soldier Fly (Hermetia Illucens) against a Selection of Human Pathogens.
